ygData.subject: RE: Quest Info Req (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... He s still there, and if you hail him he talks about the titanic bridge. But there s no keywords [] in what he says so I have no idea what to say next.. I
ygData.messageBody:
> I know the guy that talks (or used to in beta) about a
> titanic bridge. He is in South Qeynos, he is located
> in a wood house directly to the right of the clock

He's still there, and if you hail him he talks about the titanic bridge. But
there's no keywords [] in what he says so I have no idea what to say next..
I suppose I could just give him the map (they're fairly easy to get) and see
what happens.

> Good luck, and tell me if you get
> something to work.

Someone also told me that the map is supposed to go to a guard (in Qeynos I
believe) so I just don't know where this one is supposed to go. (Thus the
reason I asked hehe)

PS: Have any of you been in the Plaguebringers area of the Qeynos Aqueducts?
It is *so* neat looking. (But not as cool as Neriak is) Suggestion - start a
human necro and go looking. Don't take your Bard down there.
